name: 3D Garbage Truck Racing - eXtreme Truck Racer Game Free
name_original: 3D Garbage Truck Racing - eXtreme Truck Racer Game Free
description:
3D Garbarge Truck RacingGarbage Truck Racing is the latest racing game to hit the streets. However, instead of driving a sports car, you get to sit behind the wheel of a big garbage truck. Race down the streets, avoid oncoming obstacles, and try to make your way to the end.

Will you be able to make it?

FEATURES

- 3D rendered graphics.
- Easy controls.
- Cool soundtrack.
- Lots of fun!
